name: Celestial Chat
description:
You arrive at this place. You are stuck. What brought you here? How did you get into this strange and surreal world engulfed by darkness? Though, it’s not completely dark. You see a glowing face watching you. The moon. You decide to have a little chat with the moon. Does the moon possess all the answers you seek?

Words: ~1,000+

Gameplay: 20-30 mins.

'Space Bar' to interact.

'Esc' to pause.
